thread.title: Colin Hollister - Bristol UK
thread.title_full: Mantel Beoordeeld door Colin Hollister - Bristol UK

author: Colin Hollister - Bristol UK
title: Colin Hollister - Bristol UK
text:
Never used Mantel before but found their web-site via Google when searching for various parts. I found it easy to navigate and they had all the items I wanted at the right price. Placed my order on-line and got rapid delivery with excellent packaging!
I'll be back!
